overview: A man in his thirties decides to change his life. Get yourself a new hairstyle. Throw away the tie, throw the suit into a corner. Visit the company for the last time to throw the computer keyboard on the floor in front of the boss. Then, set off into a changed, sunny city. Splash in a puddle, give a flower to a girl you meet, dance.
title: Dzień, w którym umrę
